note: TDU rates update on March 1 and September 1 each year. Based on RateGrinder database Jan 2026.

tdus.name: CenterPoint Energy
tdus.notes: Largest Houston TDU. Rate includes Resiliency Plan charges.

tdus.name: Oncor Electric Delivery
tdus.notes: Largest TDU in Texas serving over 10 million Texans

tdus.name: AEP Texas Central
tdus.service_area: Corpus Christi, Rio Grande Valley, Victoria, and surrounding areas

tdus.name: AEP Texas North
tdus.service_area: Abilene, San Angelo, and surrounding West Texas areas

tdus.name: Texas-New Mexico Power
tdus.service_area: Scattered areas including Galveston, Texas City, parts of North and East Texas
tdus.notes: Highest monthly base charge among major TDUs

tdus.name: Lubbock Power & Light
tdus.notes: Joined competitive market January 2024. No monthly base charge.
